extendedInfo.description: The 1-800 CONTACTS app is the fastest, easiest and most enjoyable way to order contact lenses in the solar system. Where else can you reorder your contacts in 3 taps? Pluto? PLUTO ISNâT EVEN A PLANET ANYMORE. SIMPLE ORDERING Ordering for the first time? Itâs slightly more than 3 taps, but itâs still simple and quick and weâll walk you through the whole process like a scout helping an old lady cross the street, except not in a patronizing way because thatâs rude. YOU HAVE QUESTIONS? WE HAVE ANSWERS In addition to your contacts youâre getting a whole lotta service. Friendly service, at that. If you ever have any questions you can call, email, or text us right from the app. We answer calls in 30 seconds, respond to emails in 15 minutes, and texts in 4 minutes - all by real live people with adorable Utah accents (NOTE: you only get the adorable accent if you call). LENSGAUGE FOR EVERYONE Perhaps you arenât a 1-800 CONTACTS customer yet. Itâs OK. We arenât here to judge. Our LensGauge feature can be used by anybody to be reminded of when itâs time to swap out their lenses. Because nobody likes itchy red eyes. Nobody. FEATURES GALORE â¢ Scan your contact lens box to upload your prescription â no typing required. â¢ Upload a pic of your paper prescription and weâll ship your contacts even sooner. â¢ GPS-based search for a local eye doctor. â¢ Import your docâs information directly from your Address Book. â¢ Scan your credit card with the camera or use PayPal for less tiny-keyboard typing. â¢ Speedy reordering from your secure account. The 1-800 CONTACTS app is free to download and free to use. Freer than a bald eagle clutching an American flag punching the Berlin Wall. Itâs that free. You know what to do.

reviews.title: Super Easy
reviews.comment: I was able to take a picture of my prescription,  order contacts, and check out within 5 minutes.
reviews.author: Tammy Liverance

reviews.title: Just Bad!
reviews.comment: I had a very hard time using this confusing app,wish it would of worked for me putting in Dr info,I had to drive all the way to Walmart and pay more.
reviews.author: Matthew Carothers

reviews.title: It was pretty good.
reviews.comment: Did my order straight through. Had a little mishap when it was lagging to add a card, but it was great. No s&h charge! Yay :D
reviews.author: Susana Emm

reviews.title: No zero option for eye
reviews.comment: My Rx is the same in both eyes so I usually only order 1 box total at a time. App doesn\'t allow entering a 0 for either eye so by default I have to order double what I usually do. So..not so awesome.
reviews.author: Lisa Polley

reviews.title: Best app EVER
reviews.comment: Best app EVER!   Made ordering new contacts so easy!   You won\'t be dissatisfied!
reviews.author: Emily Herritz

reviews.title: Doesnt work
reviews.comment: Crashed until I re-installed, now it wont let me order anything other than my \"usual\" order, if I try to it doesnt let me order from my own account or select my dr info (tried to order anyway but it WILL NOT select my dr)...terrible app!
reviews.author: kaleigh brown

reviews.title: Easy to access products
reviews.comment: Very convenient app to check prices and products available.
reviews.author: Haley Ellis

reviews.title: Coupon code?
reviews.comment: Any way to use coupon codes in this app?
reviews.author: Kevin Smith

reviews.comment: Glitchy and slow
reviews.author: tonya Bower

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work properly ...
reviews.comment: The website works fine, but the mobile app is not only extremely slow, but confusing and doesnt work properly.  Once it finds your brand, all these pop ups cover 3/4 of the screen asking \"which eye?\" ; But there\'s no option to choose left or right eye and if you push the back button thinking it will go to the main menu, it closes.  Two stars for me. Not impressed.
reviews.author: Darcy Duncan

reviews.title: Don\'t Get this app!
reviews.comment: This app froze on me as I was putting in my info. I wanted to try the app because they have a decent discount but for now ill just stick to the one done online. Good riddens!!!!
reviews.author: Lori Ingram

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: Too many problems to list here. App is horrible. maybe an update could help but I\'m not going to download this again either way.
reviews.author: Jack Brown

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Very useful, thanks
reviews.author: scott fields

reviews.title: Stop sending me notices
reviews.comment: I want this app to reorder....not to spam notices that I need to reorder. There\'s not even an option to turn off notices
reviews.author: michael manion

reviews.title: Unable to login
reviews.comment: I love using 1800 contacts and just recently downloaded the app. Unfortunately, I\'m not able to login through the app so I haven\'t made any purchases. I\'ll keep my fingers crossed that the bug can be fixed.
reviews.author: Katherine Andasol

reviews.title: Seems nice
reviews.comment: While the app is easy to use, I can\'t place an order because it keeps changing the exp. date of my credit card when saving.
reviews.author: J. Holmes

reviews.title: Simple and Quick
reviews.comment: I was able to order quickly and without any hassles.  Thanks for the great app!
reviews.author: Jon Bott

reviews.title: Why release this if it doesn\'t work?
reviews.comment: Look, this would be great if the expiration on my credit card was 1/16, but it isn\'t. Credit card scanner doesn\'t work. Getting a text in the middle of manually entering a number kicks you out. Also, why do I need to enter my doctor 15 times? I\'d love this app if it worked.
reviews.author: Kendrick Kirk

reviews.title: Shocked!
reviews.comment: I panicked when I realized I only had 2 pairs of contacts left.  I downloaded this app on a whim and I am so glad I did.  I\'m shocked by how easy this was.  Just created an account, put in my prescription, paid with paypal (awesome!) and was finished.  Took about 3 minutes.  AND I got a discount!  I\'ll definitely be using it again.
reviews.author: Madeline O\'Krongly

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Convenient and simple.  I loved the discount.
reviews.author: Aaron Petersen
